settings.content:
Our Return Policy

We are offering extended returns and exchanges throughout the holiday season. All purchases made between October 8, 2024 – December 23, 2024, are eligible to be returned or exchanged until January 31, 2025.

We want you to be entirely satisfied with your RalphLauren.com purchase. If you are not, we will gladly accept the return of items that are unwashed, unworn, and unaltered with the original tags attached and accompanied by the original invoice for online orders, or purchase information from your printed store receipt, within 30 days of order shipment date (excluding watches and fine jewelry which must be returned within 10 days of the order shipment date).

  • Customers may return item(s) within 30 days of the order shipment date or in-store purchase date.
  • Orders placed using PayPal or Klarna cannot be returned to Ralph Lauren, Polo Ralph Lauren, or Double RL stores. PayPal or Klarna orders must be returned by mail via our online returns process, and are not eligible for exchanges.
  • Select limited-edition styles are eligible for return within seven days of the shipping date. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
  • Watches and Fine Jewelry must be in perfect condition, with all protective materials, tags and stickers attached. To return watches and fine jewelry, please call 888-475-7674. Enjoy free returns within 10 days of the shipment date.
  • Please allow up to seven business days for us to receive and process your return. You will receive an email notification upon the completion of return processing.

EXCHANGES & RETURNS

Fairway & Greene will gladly accept exchanged or returns of any non custom-embroidered merchandise for a full refund within 30 days of purchase.  

Fairway & Greene cannot accept any returns or exchanges on international orders, including orders to Canada.

Please visit our Returns Center  to obtain a return shipping label.

Please allow up to two weeks to process returns or exchanges.

Fairway & Greene cannot accept any returns or exchanges from other vendors who sell our product third party.

For additional questions relating to Fairway & Greene's return or exchange policies please reach out to our customer service team at 888-924-1222

 

Thanks for shopping!

Exclusions

The following items may not be returned or exchanged:​​


• Personalized Items
• Gift Boxes
• Home Lighting
• Coffee Products
• Furniture
• Rugs
